ygData.subject: Re: Sneak does work
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow!  Soloing Avo s at 27 -- woo hoo you rick!  I was too chicken to try it until mid 30 s. And then milked them until they went green on me. Also here s a
ygData.messageBody:
Wow! Soloing Avo's at 27 -- woo hoo you rick! I was too chicken to try it
until mid 30's. And then milked them until they went green on me.

Also here's a couple shots from my archives (Mistmoore shots):

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/homesweetmm.jpg


http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/spoilermm.jpg


http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/mayongph.jpg

Sylly



> From: "J L Smith" <slider@...>
>
> BTW, I use MMM (21st song) to get down from the penthouse. So far it has
put me on the ground safely everytime (safe fall will not save you if you
fall from the penthouse). A nice strategy when soloing Aviaks: Charm Harrier
or Avocet at top of city, MMM to the ground, find some open fighting room,
fire up chain/fear when charm wears off. No substitute for a productive
group, xp-wise, but a nice option not available to all classes at this
level. Useful when you're bored, waiting for your Paw group to form.
>
> Operaman Overtone
> Meandering Maestro of the 27th song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> Innoruuk
